name: 7Days
intro: A stop motion animation describing the creation of Earth using cake-baking as a metaphor. From creation of space to the completion of planet Earth, this animation shows the wonders of our world.

name: ACTIVATE
intro: This 3D animation project meant to create an alienated and lonesome atmosphere by creating a dumping area with blocks and communication devices. While electricity flow through the cables and light up the lights, the once discarded machines come alive and start to work again. The last video shown in the screens behind represents the signal sent from the dumping area to the outside. However no one is going to see it.

name: Catch Me
intro: This is a short film animation about dolls live inside a claw machine and their adventure of finding a good master.
owner: Ma Sai Hung Koo Ho Wing Wong Wing Sze

name: CIVILIZED
intro: CIVILIZED is an animation that shows the human building history from stone age to modern age. CIVILIZED not only combining both hand key and procedure animation technique but also the basic animation principals like stretch and squash to create cartoony style life to all objects!

name: The End Of Your World我的世界未日
intro: “The End of Your World” is a visual effect based sci-fi movie which focusing on 3D and 2D creation. We aim to build a better quality of visual and present our story to audience. This story is about the abandoned home domestic robot who calls “Papper” with his master Kress. He brings her around the world to find rockets which bring Kress back to the human kind. Abandon and Fantasy is our main topic.
owner: Wan Yeuk Hei Dick  鄒子傑
url: Animation Visual Effects/End of your World/The End of Your World_1.png
Animation Visual Effects/End of your World/The End of Your World_2.png
Animation Visual Effects/End of your World/The End of Your World_3.png
Animation Visual Effects/End of your World/The End of Your World_4.png

name: Exchange
intro: We always have extensive imagination about bad situation, which constructs the fear inside our mind. However, we should be rational sometimes and let the justice we insisted conquers our fear. This animation is a short story about a death overcomes his fear and takes the right choice that influences the future.

name: Father Island
intro: Family is the most influential channel to the growth and personality of children. Base on my own heretofore, to create and illustrate a story about love and hurt in a single parent family, in order to investigate the relationship, complicated emotion, and impact on children growth. Choosing sadness or forgive determines by mind and growth. The story starts by a hide and seek game. Is lost and found are opposite to each other? If once we are hurt in child life, will there be a scar forever?

name: Fly(翔)
intro: A story about a conflict between a penguin and his bird siblings. It is going to remind audience a simple basis of life ── We are who we are and we do not have to compare among ourselves. Everyone can be successful and fly in his or her own fields.

name: Growing Fountain （夢之泉）
intro: Sometimes we try hard to find something but that THING is actually in front of us. We miss it just because of the timing. This animation is a reflection of myself. I want to show my process of creation through this piece of work.
url: Animation Visual Effects/Growing Fountain/Wing Lam Mak - GrowingFountain_01.png
Animation Visual Effects/Growing Fountain/Wing Lam Mak - GrowingFountain_02.png
Animation Visual Effects/Growing Fountain/Wing Lam Mak - GrowingFountain_03.png

name: Heartbroken Night 一夜心碎
intro: Most of the people tried run away from home. Conflicts are often made, especially within family. I would like to mimic a situation that after a n argue in a family, no one is home, relationship is in danger, but family is family, it is unbreakable, and has the ability to heal itself, this piece is aim to remind people that family is eternity, no matter how worst is the situation, family will never leave anyone behind.
url: Animation Visual Effects/Heartbroken Night/Kelvin Chung - Heartbroken_Night_1.tif
Animation Visual Effects/Heartbroken Night/Kelvin Chung - Heartbroken_Night_2.tif
Animation Visual Effects/Heartbroken Night/Kelvin Chung - Heartbroken_Night_3.tif

name: Ignite
intro: This is about a fire who is uncertain about the purpose of his existence. Fire sees how water gives life to the dead land. The fire wishes to be as great and powerful as water, but the way he used his abilities only lead to destruction. Envy causes a minuscule fire to ignite a destructive wildfire.

name: Metamorphosis
intro: From the perspective of the creator, Metamorphosis concentrates and transforms the author’s dreams and experiences in the past by using the metaphor, meanwhile it turns the hardship into the path of hope towards the future.

name: OTTHON
intro: “Otthon”. It is a Hungarian word, means Home. Have you ever feel disconnected, thought that nobody will ever be able to understand and reach out to the cold, merciless space that you inhabit? It is a story about being reached out. The imagination and caring from others are priceless, and we should be aware of them and cherish. Where we could feel care, that’s our home.

name: Paper Plane
intro: The paper plane is like a real plane which brings your dream. A boy throws a paper plane. And the paper plane starts to travel in the boy’s study room. It flies over books which mean the knowledge about plane the boy knows. And the little white flies higher and higher…

name: Sashimi Nakushita
intro: This is a short film that made during the Golden sugarcane competition in Taiwan. It is talking about the world without Shashimi. The main characters with superpowers, namely having a lot of money, launching high-speed wifi and producing baguettes, group as a team to find out the boss.
owner: LAM Kam Ho ZHANG Tian Yi LI Cheuk Hin YEUNG Chun Yee AU Tze Long CHEUNG Ching Sheung TSANG Cheung Lun MAK Wing Man FUNG Ho Ning LO Tsz Long

name: SleepyPleesy
intro: “Sleepy Pleesy” is a 3D character comedic animation. Pleesy is working in DELIFAST, a delivery company. After a long rough day working, he finally finished his work at mid-night. When he thought he can at last leave, 3 more packages were found  for delivery while checking the daily schedule. This is a story about the sleepy Pleesy driving overnight. He kept sleeping during the drive, which caused dangers and accidents during the delivery. Turnouts it became a hilarious and interesting journey.

name: Sphere
intro: Sphere is one of the most basic shapes. In this project, I want to show the beauty of sphere by adding different textures and lightings on it. I hope I can bring out the charm of sphere by using different texturing style through this work.
url: Animation Visual Effects/Sphere/Wing Lam Mak - Sphere_01.png
Animation Visual Effects/Sphere/Wing Lam Mak - Sphere_02.png
Animation Visual Effects/Sphere/Wing Lam Mak - Sphere_03.png
Animation Visual Effects/Sphere/Wing Lam Mak - Sphere_04.png

name: This is Creative Media
intro: It is about student in Creative Media. The protagonist comes in with a camera and he learns different things, such as, programming, photo shooting, game making and visual effect. This is video is combined with chroma keying, 3D model building, panoramic making.
owner: Zhang Tian Yi Ma Sai Hung Chung Yu Hin
url: Animation Visual Effects/This is Creative Media/1.png
Animation Visual Effects/This is Creative Media/2.png
Animation Visual Effects/This is Creative Media/3.png

name: THOU 內臟感覺
intro: Two people sit in front of each other. They discuss about an issue. It could be a story or a murder, but they cannot confirm its authenticity. Could love be the motivation or reason of all action? I took a deep breath with cold air. I feel the visceral inside my body.

name: AIAS
intro: Our AIAS project, a script-based game created by Unity3D, would like to mainly provide experience of simple scripting to control a game flow. Hence, even children can learn scripting through gaming. a remote control online fighting game through mobile devices(Android/iOS) to a computer(Windows/ Mac OS X)
owner: Chun Tsz Fung Chau Ching Skye Chan Long Yin

name: Art Battle
intro: “Art Battle!!” is a 3D action game which the player can freely enter different worlds inside different paintings featured with different visual arts styles and enjoy the fun and excitement of defeating all the bosses hidden in these paintings accompanied with the fresh use of drawing tablet and complementary colors.
owner: 1. Lee Chun Hin 2. Wong Sze Nga Sear 3. Lai Hoi Yan

name: Berreo Ukulele Master 百里奧 烏克麗麗電子學習器
intro: Berreo Ukulele Master is a ukulele learning tool for beginners, at the same time it can also be a music instrument, featuring painless and compact design. “Painless learning experience” and “Play the moment” are the themes of our product.
owner: LAM, Beryl  YEUNG, Chun Yee

name: The Colossus
intro: In their old anarchy to the horizon-line. It would take more than a lightning-stroke To create such a ruin. -- - “The Colossus” by Sylvia Plath Game Programming / Wong Woon Him Animation & Modelling / Yip Wing Sau
owner: Wong Woon Him Yip Wing Sau

name: EastEnd
intro: To escape from dangers in the space station and to explore the space station to discover the secret behind
owner: Wong Woon Him Yip Wing Sau

name: Go! Go! Totem God!
intro: Winner in Global Game Jam 2016 Hong Kong Short and fun mini-game. 5 people cooperation game requires a big screen and 5 smartphone. Players where each must complete an action in the real world using their smartphone. The natives are trying to revival the old totem god and send them god back to the heaven.

name: Internal Affairs 諜變解碼
intro: Internal Affairs is an intense elimination game between infiltrators from both the Triad and the Police Force. The card game is designed for 5-8 players, with alternative rules for 2-4.
owner: Chan Yuk Ngon  Cheung Tsz Hei

name: SoulTree
intro: This is a Strategy Game with multi-story line. Player is acting as Soul Tree and trying to cultivate the plants and development the regions. Player needs to experience and accomplish different events and missions, and guard the forest during the attack of King of Devils.

name: Space Commander
intro: The gamer uses the existing and generating unit to destroy the enemy’s mother ship by the leap motion machine. In order to achieve Virtual Reality, we will demonstrate an interior view of a mothership, player can experience the battlefield by looking through the windows, there will be spaceship passing by when you construct an attack order, when your mothership overcome attacks, there player can experience fire, damage of equipment and shaking.
owner: LAM Ka Lun  LAI Ming Him  LEUNG Mei Wa

name: The UFO
intro: The UFO is a mini pc game using the phone as a controller. The Player is received a mission from the headquarter of the alien to collect cows for investigate the animal in Earth. The Player needed to hide from people in the farm using the Stealth technology on the UFO while collecting cows
owner: 1. Lee Chun Hin 2. Wong Sze Nga Sear

name: Uncle Band
intro: A VR music game with a fantastic virtual concert. Being a performer, player able to play the guitar as a super star
owner: Choi Mang Ngai Ng Tsun Ming Tang Hon Lun Cheung Kan Wing Chan Yiu Chung

name: Wanderlust Nova
intro: A flight simulator brings you out of space, a brand new experience of traveling. Visit different planets and discover new species, an unpredictable adventure is waiting for you!
owner: Chun Tsz Fung Chau Ching Skye Chan Long Yin

name: Aeroplane Olive 飛機欖
intro: Our project idea is an installation to promote local culture, an extinct feature of Hong Kong: Aeroplane Olive. We want player to experience the working flow of an Aeroplane Olive seller, so that we can introduce the culture during the experience.
owner: Choi Suet Man Au Yeung Tsz Yan Lau Lok In Kwan Yat Fung Ng Hon Wah Li Chun Sum

name: Creative Weather Report
intro: The interactive installation is a weather report program for switching scenes and changing visual effects of weather simulation by user gesture or motion detected by motion sensing input device (Kinect). The program picture consists of a major screen of studio, a minor subscreen for outdoor scene and a weather map as background. The user interface is designed for ordinary people with normal vision. The installation requires at least 1 user, who will be cast in the role of a reporter in the studio, and allows one more user to take the role of an outdoor investigative reporter.
owner: TAM Pui Ho OR Wai Yin

name: DiscoNightWave
intro: I used to make artwork / installation with sound and light. Inspired by Cubism and Low Poly style, I made a real time computer graphic interactive program which can triangulate body shape of audience with glowing effect. In additioan, the wave (triangles) effect is audio reactive by jittering.
owner: Wong Woon Him

name: Farming Strategist
intro: This is a single player farming simulation game with physical stimulation. Player is to choose between organic seed and Genetically Modified (GM) Seed for farming. The game is made to raise the public awareness on the pros and cons of using GM Seed for farming through showing different game result after using the two different types of seeds.
owner: LO Cheung Kei CHIO Hawk See TANG Wing Sze

name: iMassage
intro: The installation is an Augmented Reality interactive program that provides instructions of acupressure for different physical discomforts. The application target is the general public who are interesting in Chinese acupuncture point, including teenagers and adult. The application uses Kinect to sense a user and maps acupuncture points on the user’s body for treating physical discomforts.
owner: TAM Pui Ho  YIP Mei Ting LI Wai Man

name: Japanese Sword Master (鍛刀工房)
intro: Japanese Sword Master is an interactive simulation game of making Japanese swords. Through this installation game, we hope players can appreciate the beauty and the spirit behind making the swords and also have fun while experiencing the traditional techniques and the reason behind different complex actions.
owner: LO Miu Ki  LAM Wing Kei  WONG Hei Yin  HO Ka Man WONG Husan Fung

name: Rabbit in the Cage
intro: Our installation wants to raise the public attention on animal abuse. Merchandises treat the rabbit badly and get their fur for clothing unethically. “Rabbit In The Cage” shows our choices to treat a rabbit. Human should treat animal as our friends rather than a product and stop wearing furs.
owner: Wong Chui Yin  Leung Sin Ying Lam Man Tung

name: Run! Vendor走鬼
intro: Run Vendor is an interactive installation target at simulating the immersive experience of 走鬼 (illegal vendors on street and chasing by the police officer). The basic setup is a manual treadmill connected to a vendor trolley, and audiences are running on the treadmill and playing with a game projected on a wall. We aim at reflecting the reality which vendors are facing in Hong Kong, and arouse the awareness of the general public.

name: 在藝術裡中文字都是一個樣子 (Chinese word looks like similar, in art form)
intro: Moving the camera lens with slow shutter is the main technical skill to create this photo series. When I was an exchange student in Beijing, I used to capture Chinese words of light box and see its beauty in a contemporary sight.
owner: Chan Hoi Yin
url: Photography Graphics/Chinese Word Look Like Similar/ChineseWordLooksLikeSimilar (1).JPG
Photography Graphics/Chinese Word Look Like Similar/ChineseWordLooksLikeSimilar (2).JPG
Photography Graphics/Chinese Word Look Like Similar/ChineseWordLooksLikeSimilar (3).JPG
Photography Graphics/Chinese Word Look Like Similar/ChineseWordLooksLikeSimilar (4).JPG
Photography Graphics/Chinese Word Look Like Similar/ChineseWordLooksLikeSimilar (5).JPG

name: Imitation - In the forest
intro: A photo series of a famous photography imitation - V-J Day in Times Square (1945) by Alfred Eisenstaed.
owner: Chan Hoi Yin

name: INSIDE OUT
intro: The spaces in front of and behind the glass merge together in a shared moment. In this series, I want to create ambiguous physical space from both sides of the window glass in a single exposure. The encounter of the people and whatever is inside of the window is the poetic contingency that is irreplaceable. This series takes you to a new reality where you are not really sure whether you are looking inside or outside.
owner: Hung Yun
url: Photography Graphics/INSIDE OUT/Yun Hung - INSIDE OUT_01.jpg
Photography Graphics/INSIDE OUT/Yun Hung - INSIDE OUT_02.jpg
Photography Graphics/INSIDE OUT/Yun Hung - INSIDE OUT_03.jpg
Photography Graphics/INSIDE OUT/Yun Hung - INSIDE OUT_04.jpg

name: Ngau Chi Wan Market
intro: In this illustration, I want to rebuild Ngau Chi Wan Market to a gorgeous wonderland and divided it into Natural, Rush and The Past. I visualise it with an old school TV box mixes with tall buildings in black and white colour. The unique old bridge can lead us entering into the market - a magnificent and mysterious place. A place which has many animals living in there, just like a wonderland.
owner: Leung Yi Hang
url: Photography Graphics/Ngau Chi Wan Market/emily leung - NgauChiWanMarket_01.jpg
Photography Graphics/Ngau Chi Wan Market/emily leung - NgauChiWanMarket_02.jpg
Photography Graphics/Ngau Chi Wan Market/emily leung - NgauChiWanMarket_03.jpg

name: 油麻地果欄 Yau Ma Tei Wholesale Fruit Market
intro: This is the Hong Kong I see, I feel and treasure. To me, Hong Kong is a unique place embeded with a hybrid cultural and historical background. I often feel disappointed when people said there is nothing special in Hong Kong. In fact there were a lot of special spots and people you can find in such a small place. There are a lot to look into, too much to be explored. I would like to document this significant fruit market in Hong Kong and to present the long lost nostalgia that few people have ever experienced. It is not simply recording the “old things”, but to remind the people the heritage they once owned. To call the people to slow down and take time to look at their homeland. Do not view Hong Kong through the internet. Do not believe in hearsay. Do not judge through previous stereotypes.
owner: Liu Ho Yee

name: Yung
intro: Yung is my friend, and a boy with albinism. These pictures are the moments that I was trying to catch his youth.
owner: Wong Hsuan Fung
